about_the_game:
The official soundtrack selection of Kingdom Come: Deliverance II.

Quintessence of Jan Valta and Adam Sporka’s four years worth of work. 

Purchase the game‘s OST Essentials and immerse yourself in the only magical element of the realistic world of Kingdom Come: Deliverance II – the tunes accompanying Henry on his journey.

Contains 42 tracks.  
Total Time: 1:22:41

Lead Composer: Jan Valta

Additional Composer: Adam Sporka

Performed by Warhorse Studio Orchestra & Choir.

Mixing & Mastering by Ondřej Urban.
